title: Account Service Manager
salary: $23,387.60 PHP per month/$400.00 USD per month
job_overview:
Our company helps individuals who are in need of automobile repossession assistance. The clients are going through a financial hardship and are falling behind in making their automobile payments to the bank/lender. The agent job responsibilities will require inbound and outbound calling, answering questions and concerns, and completing a short form application. 

*Work Week Day's Only (EST TIME ZONE)
*Weekly Salary Pay + Monthly Bonus

We provide crm, telecommunication app, and full training on day to day duties. Please submit your resume for more information. 

Thank you.
